name: safecap

screenshots.caption: a flyout scenario loaded in the platform

short_description:
The overall aim of the SafeCap project is to develop modelling techniques and tools for improving railway capacity while ensuring that safety standards are maintained.

Useful links:
Project homepage: http://safecap.cs.ncl.ac.uk
Safecap Platform website with additional resources: http://safecap.sourceforge.net

The first public version of the Safecap Platform (v0.2) is now released. It can be found in the Files folder
summary: Safecap Platform for improving railway capacity via formal modelling
